医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
揭示了肺癌免疫治疗中预测生物标志物的有前途的途径今天在国际肺癌研究协会 2024 年世界肺癌大会上发表的一项研究证明了开发免疫检查点抑制剂预测生物标志物的一条有希望的途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Promising-pathway-for-predictive-biomarkers-in-lung-cancer-immunotherapy-revealed.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Promising-pathway-for-predictive-biomarkers-in-lung-cancer-immunotherapy-revealed.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=952460e1-c1f3-4a0b-95fc-29a5d83b76bc Mon, 09 Sep 2024 12:19:00 -0400 Promising pathway for predictive biomarkers in lung cancer immunotherapy revealed
Ifinatamab deruxtecan 在晚期小细胞肺癌中显示出有希望的结果根据 2 期 IDeate-Lung01 研究的中期分析，抗体药物偶联物 ifinatamab deruxtecan (I-DXd) 在接受过治疗的广泛期小细胞肺癌 (ES-SCLC) 患者中显示出具有临床意义的反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Ifinatamab-deruxtecan-shows-promising-results-in-advanced-small-cell-lung-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Ifinatamab-deruxtecan-shows-promising-results-in-advanced-small-cell-lung-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d4a8a279-aeb1-4d1b-9310-1b0ba9cc73b8 Mon, 09 Sep 2024 12:14:13 -0400 Ifinatamab deruxtecan shows promising results in advanced small cell lung cancer
Radnet 的 DeepHealth 和 HOPPR 建立合作伙伴关系，推进医疗保健领域的人工智能DeepHealth 和 HOPPR 的合作重点是人工智能驱动的癌症检测模型、简化放射学工作流程和改善临床结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Radnete28099s-DeepHealth-and-HOPPR-forge-partnership-to-advance-AI-in-healthcare.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Radnete28099s-DeepHealth-and-HOPPR-forge-partnership-to-advance-AI-in-healthcare.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=33deed54-10d4-4b51-8fe4-12e0a6ca9a07 Mon, 09 Sep 2024 10:49:00 -0400 Radnet’s DeepHealth and HOPPR forge partnership to advance AI in healthcare
“互惠是什么？为什么它是一种医学不可或缺的一部分？”创始人诺埃尔·菲茨帕特里克 (Noel Fitzpatrick) 教授解释道One Medicine 强调人类和动物的共同健康，旨在通过合作研究和道德实践来优化医疗结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/e28098What-is-Reciprocity-and-why-is-it-integral-to-One-Medicinee28099-由创始人教授Noel-Fitzpatrick解释。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/e28098What-is-Reciprocity-and-why-is-it-integral-to-One-Medicinee28099-由创始人教授Noel-Fitzpatrick解释。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d27935b8-af3a-4d88-a65f-6dfe32ae1284 Mon, 09 Sep 2024 10:28:00 -0400 ‘What is Reciprocity and why is it integral to One Medicine?’, explained by Founder, Professor Noel Fitzpatrick
全身使用糖皮质激素会使患糖尿病的风险加倍正在接受全身性糖皮质激素治疗的患者患糖尿病的可能性是未接受治疗的患者的两倍以上，在西班牙马德里举行的欧洲糖尿病研究协会 (EASD) 年会（9 月 9 日至 13 日）将听到。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Systemic-glucocorticoid-use-doubles-risk-of-developmenting-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Systemic-glucocorticoid-use-doubles-risk-of-developmenting-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bc77c626-2794-4ef0-bc47-c91bba177733 Mon, 09 Sep 2024 08:34:47 -0400 Systemic glucocorticoid use doubles risk of developing diabetes
夜猫子的体重指数较高，腰围较大，患 2 型糖尿病的风险较高欧洲糖尿病协会年会上公布的一项新研究显示，夜猫子的 BMI 较高、腰围较大、隐藏的体内脂肪较多，而且比早睡的人患 2 型糖尿病 (T2D) 的可能性高出近 50%西班牙马德里糖尿病研究中心 (EASD)（9 月 9 日至 13 日）发现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Night-owls-have-higher-BMI-larger-waists-and-face-higher-risk-of-type-2-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Night-owls-have-higher-BMI-larger-waists-and-face-higher-risk-of-type-2-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0a79c22f-d4c5-4956-a196-4c109b86577d Mon, 09 Sep 2024 08:17:30 -0400 Night owls have higher BMI, larger waists and face higher risk of type 2 diabetes
减肥干预措施可以降低糖尿病患者严重感染的风险减肥干预措施可以降低糖尿病患者患严重流感和其他感染的风险，这项新研究在西班牙马德里举行的欧洲糖尿病研究协会 (EASD) 年会上提出（9 月 9 日至 13 日）建议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Weight-loss-interventions-may-lower-risk-of-severe-infections-in-diabetics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Weight-loss-interventions-may-lower-risk-of-severe-infections-in-diabetics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7eece282-eb72-4e01-9544-c61ad08894cc Mon, 09 Sep 2024 07:55:31 -0400 Weight loss interventions may lower risk of severe infections in diabetics
儿童时期吃水果、燕麦和黑麦可能会增加 1 型糖尿病的风险在西班牙马德里举行的欧洲糖尿病研究协会 (EASD) 年会上（9 月 9 日至 13 日）公布的新研究表明，儿童时期吃水果、燕麦和黑麦与罹患糖尿病的较高风险相关1 糖尿病（T1D）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Eating-fruit-oats-and-rye-in-childhood-may-increase-type-1-diabetes-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Eating-fruit-oats-and-rye-in-childhood-may-increase-type-1-diabetes-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=609b5206-b1b7-4ce8-9613-cd94998a94cb Mon, 09 Sep 2024 07:51:06 -0400 Eating fruit, oats and rye in childhood may increase type 1 diabetes risk
新研究强调语言在流产护理中的作用伦敦大学学院研究人员领导的一份新报告称，许多医疗机构用来描述流产的语言加剧了一些人所经历的悲伤和创伤，并且可能成为决定流产后心理健康的关键因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/New-research-highlights-the-role-of-language-in-pregnancy-loss-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/New-research-highlights-the-role-of-language-in-pregnancy-loss-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8c37ff69-6f65-4cd4-ab18-06b6cd9d8566 Mon, 09 Sep 2024 07:46:33 -0400 New research highlights the role of language in pregnancy loss care
怀孕早期良好的心脏健康可能会降低先兆子痫和高血压的遗传风险根据美国心脏协会 2024 年高血压科学会议上发表的初步研究，在怀孕前三个月保持良好的心血管健康可能会抵消发生先兆子痫和/或妊娠期高血压的遗传风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Good-heart-health-during-early-pregnancy-may-reduce-genic-risk-of-preeclampsia-and-hypertension.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Good-heart-health-during-early-pregnancy-may-reduce-genic-risk-of-preeclampsia-and-hypertension.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8e28e678-f9e2-4d78-bb7d-4268c4938d31 Mon, 09 Sep 2024 07:36:39 -0400 Good heart health during early pregnancy may reduce genetic risk of preeclampsia and hypertension
